website_summaries.verdict: Simple pro-grade design featuring a steel core ring, just like those used in studios and gyms.
pros: Given its quality construction, this model is often used for physical therapy or conditioning
Comes with a DVD with a variety of traditional Pilates exercises
cons: Can wear out or turn into an egg shape after a year or two or regular use

customer_reviews.title: Virtually Zero Resistance - Quality has gone down on Stamina Magic Circle
customer_reviews.text: As a Pilates trainer, I've purchased many brands & styles of Pilates Magic circles. When I purchased this model (which says Aero Pilates on the handles) to match up with other Magic Circles from Stamina (my other circles say Magic Circle on the handles) I was seriously disappointed. I purchased 5, and none of them have any resistance to them. They appear oval, not circular. When you press on the handles, the magic circle compresses almost 100%. I don't know if this is a different Stamina model, or if the production quality has simply gone down dramatically. There are other Magic circles on the market that provide better resistance - this order is being returned.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Binnendyk

customer_reviews.title: As of 2019, Authentic Product
customer_reviews.text: I was worried by some of the low star reviews and the great price that this listing may not be authentic. Given that they were several years old I decided to try this out. My mother is doing physical therapy and finds this to be a great tool during her sessions. She took this one in and her therapist pronounced it authentic after inspecting and doing a side by side with the ones they have. Besides that vote for authenticity of this product, the ring is pretty firm and well constructed. Lots of versatile uses for both exercise and rehab.
customer_reviews.author: ARGTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Great product. when my coccyx is out of place
customer_reviews.text: Great product. when my coccyx is out of place, I sit on my couch with my legs at a 90 degree angle, with my spine straight and squeeze these between my knees, which are hips-width apart, as hard as I can for a few seconds. Then I repeat it a couple of times. When I do this, my coccyx goes back into place and I don't have to see the chiropractor, which saves me time and money. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Mandylyn

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this same pilates ring at the physical therapy place I have been going to for back pain. It works great for the isometric exercises I have been doing there, so I decided to buy one of my own so I could do the exercises at home on the days I don't go to physical therapy.
customer_reviews.author: janniesue

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely no instruction included.
customer_reviews.text: I am happy with the product, but I am not happy they did not include ANY information. I would have really appreciated a sheet with exercises using the Circle. I don't know how to reach them to see if it was left out in error.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for great price
customer_reviews.text: I've worked with this Magic Circle before at a studio and decided to buy one for myself and my private practice. I stand behind its quality and durability - especially for such accessible price.
customer_reviews.author: Daniela Lo Feudo

customer_reviews.title: Worth the Purchase
customer_reviews.text: Can see how this product could easily wear out after a year's worth of regular use. It's affordable enough that it's not really an issue. Will definitely need replacing at some point. It is simple and effective. I absolutely love mine! It didn't come with any instructions or workout videos which I found disappointing, but nothing a few YouTube videos can't remedy. If you're looking for a great addition to your home gym and regular workout routine I absolutely suggest the magic circle!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Kurowski-Miller

customer_reviews.title: Great for stretching!
customer_reviews.text: I love the one we use in Pilates class and decided to deepen my morning hamstring stretches with this one. Its good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Rabbid Reader

customer_reviews.title: Stamina Pilates Magic Circle
customer_reviews.text: This was recommended by my physical therapist. There are only 2 exercises that I use this for. I need to find other exercises to do with the Stamina Pilates Magic Circle ...
customer_reviews.author: SIDELINED

customer_reviews.title: exercise circle
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this circle to replace a cheaper version that lasted about a year. This one is much higher quality and I use it about every other day for a condensed pilates workout. Using this circle enabled me to take only the exercises that I need and tailor a workout that targets and tones without wasting time. I am able to use this circle for arms, core muscles, butt, and legs. It is an easy, no-nonsense way to tone the whole body. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Renate I. Lyman

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: Well made. I haven’t quite determined how to incorporate it yet with my Pilates reformer routine. So I don’t actually know if it will work for me.
customer_reviews.author: TERRY L. JOHNSON

customer_reviews.title: Simple and easy exercise tool
customer_reviews.text: Works well. Needed this for physical therapy. Arrived in one day, and able to easily get my exercises done each day. At least I don't need to dress in lots of workout gear to get them done!
customer_reviews.author: DK_Smiles

customer_reviews.title: Holds up nicely
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this since October and it has held up beautifully. Nice not to have to worry if there will be a magic circle left in my class.
customer_reviews.author: Nana Annie

customer_reviews.title: I bought this for after shoulder and knees surgeries
customer_reviews.text: Seems sturdy enough. There is no exercise book. I guess I'm supposed to guess where I find that millenials. Show some courtesy to your elders who taught you how to use your first computer. Not everything is a "gimme" nor is it an oblivious obvious.
customer_reviews.author: L J Boyd

customer_reviews.title: FLIMSY, AT BEST :(
customer_reviews.text: This is not a quality product. It lost its tension in less than six months, with occasional use. I can squeeze the two sizes all the way til they almost touch; It does not provide enough resistance -- it's flimsy -- and my instructor has now asked me to buy a new and better one, so this one was a waste of my money.
customer_reviews.author: michelle levy

customer_reviews.title: Useful for arm's workouts
customer_reviews.text: I use this for arm workouts. Not stiff enough for inner thigh workouts, if you have some inner thigh muscle. Should be fine for beginners
customer_reviews.author: Gloria

customer_reviews.title: Love the Stamina Pilates Magic Circle to compliment my Aero ...
customer_reviews.text: Love the Stamina Pilates Magic Circle to compliment my Aero Pilates Reformer. I use it every other day and slowly am building up my arms and legs! The seated leg exercise is very good once you find a comfortable position. I sit very low down and then it’s perfect! Love that!
customer_reviews.author: Carla J Schulz

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I got this for inner thigh workout on my aeropilates machine. It has hard resistance.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Lorenzana

customer_reviews.title: The DVD should come with the Stamina AeroPilates Magic Circle so you know how to use it correctly
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product and presumed it came with the instructional DVD. Never presume. I really wanted to follow an the DVD showing me the many exercises I can do for various parts of the body. Anyone who is 'thinking of purchasing the Stamina AeroPilates Magic Circle should make sure a DVD is included. The additional price is very minimal, if any.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Strength my legs and highs and arms. Very handy to have with my workouts.
customer_reviews.author: Sae

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Love this! Too light for my crazy dance instructor w legs of steel but for a normal person this is awesome! I’ve been using it every day under her instruction and seeing results in my pelvis and balance.
customer_reviews.author: Terra

customer_reviews.title: workout
customer_reviews.text: its a good product but really hard to keep in place when using it. It slips out of my legs...
customer_reviews.author: Jorjeanna

customer_reviews.title: No DVD.
customer_reviews.text: The dvd did not come with it. I was looking forward to that.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great accessory for stretching
customer_reviews.text: Love this magic circle! So many uses for exercise and stretching. Keeps its shape and the padded areas are soft/functional.

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: great product, been using for a few weeks. Really helping with Ab work.

customer_reviews.title: No CD
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t get the CD, and it doesn’t seem like this would last for very long... it is very bendy.

customer_reviews.title: Great ring but no video in the box
customer_reviews.text: Great ring but there was no video in my box??!

customer_reviews.title: No dvd
customer_reviews.text: The ring is great. It did not come with a dvd

customer_reviews.title: The Best
customer_reviews.text: No surprises here. I'm sure most of you have used one of these before, but if not, there is no better way to stretch. This thing is the best.
customer_reviews.author: Chris DiMauro

customer_reviews.title: No dvd
customer_reviews.text: No DVD included which really sucks cause thats why I bought this one cause I thought I got both. Really need to take dvd out of picture of post it clearer that DVD not included.

customer_reviews.title: Good for
customer_reviews.text: its okay. Has to be positioned just right so as not to cause tenderness in inner thigh. Good for stretching

customer_reviews.title: Great Tool for Pilates
customer_reviews.text: Great Tool for your Pilates routine and other workout exercises. Highly recommended!

customer_reviews.title: Picture not accurate! (Well, it wasn't...it looks like it has been changed.)
customer_reviews.text: This doesn't speak for the product itself. Rather, I ordered (twice) these specific magic circles and expected to receive exactly what I saw on the picture. Nope. The wording was completely different, which did not match any of my other current magic circles. I was disappointed and called customer service. They guaranteed to get me the right ones ASAP. When that package arrived, it was the same exact thing! Frustrating and unacceptable.
customer_reviews.author: Adrian

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Love this Magic Circle. So comfortable and nice resistance. Easy to work out at home and to stretch.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: great device ... introduced to me at physical therapy ... they recommended I get my own ... very good for strengthening inner thighs, buttocks

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I just started doing pilates and this circle would always kick my butt so I wanted one for home & its perfect!

customer_reviews.title: I love to use this first thing in the morning and ...
customer_reviews.text: I love to use this first thing in the morning and before bed to help with my shoulder and neck muscles. It is a great way to keep pain and stiffness at bay. My only compliant is that I didn't order the one I raslly wanted. There was an option for the Magic Circle and a video and I ordered a different one.

customer_reviews.title: Great Device for the Price
customer_reviews.text: This is sturdy and durable and I love it. It fell within my price range, arrived quickly and is light enough to transport anywhere I teach but still effective as an exercise tool when used properly with good breathing a postural support.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: ABSOLUTLY GREAT for hip flexors, arms, knees etc... while watching TV or just relaxing.

customer_reviews.title: It was exactly what I ordered

customer_reviews.title: Seems as good as the one at the gym.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the magic circle for home because I'm doing Pilates via Zoom. I'm very pleased with the quality. It seems as good as the one I use at the gym.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Winter

customer_reviews.title: tough workout
customer_reviews.text: I got this to diversify my home workouts with a resistance cord. I also want to strengthen my legs. I went online to figure out some poses and it hasn't disappointed. Construction seems good I've had it a few months. It definitely kicked up the intensity of my sessions.
customer_reviews.author: OnwardUpward

customer_reviews.title: Pilates magic circle
customer_reviews.text: Where is the CD? I didn’t get a CD! I use it for my Pilates class, but would love to learn more things to use it for!!
customer_reviews.author: aksdjf

customer_reviews.title: Pilates Studio staple
customer_reviews.text: I run a Pilates studio, and these are a staple. They do eventually wear out, but that is after A LOT of use. The pads sometimes come off, but superglue fixes that. For an individual's home use, it will last forever.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Wilkins

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Ring but lame shipping
customer_reviews.text: This Pilates circle is awesome. It helps your inner thighs and buttocks which is very important for support and movement. I have used this product and it's great. However the shipping was lame. It got here like three days late. When one has to pay for shipping they expect it to be on time. Otherwise shipping should be free.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing! You can do so much with it and get a decent workout at home
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too flexible
customer_reviews.text: This ring was much more flexible than the ones I use at the studio. Doesn't feel like I get enough of a workout....
customer_reviews.author: Dancin'Doc, age 70

customer_reviews.title: good value for money
customer_reviews.text: I bought this pilates circle to replace one I received with a video, that got crushed in the car trunk door... I use it for home workouts. It is more substancial than my last circle, but also a little heavier. Which is ok. The handle parts are different too. The last one had soft sponge handles which are comfortable in any position. This brand has shaped handles made of a soft plastic. You have to adjust your position slightly around their placement, not the other way around. It works fine, though, and I suspect will be very durable. I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: sk

customer_reviews.title: Working well so far
customer_reviews.text: A good pilates circle. I like the cushioned grips-- it seems to be helpful for keeping good form without the ring sliding around during exercises. I'm a little concerned about how much give it has... it may not last forever, but for the money I'm sure I'll get plenty of use out of it. In any case, I'm much happier with it than my last ring, and it's nice to have the variety in my workouts.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A cool gear to show off
customer_reviews.text: A cool gear to show off. I still haven't figured out how to use it to the full extent yet. But it looks cool. That's why I take it with me every time I exercise on the beach. :)
customer_reviews.author: Fan

customer_reviews.title: Home workout help
customer_reviews.text: Versatile. I use for home stretching and abs workout. I find it useful and it is easy to store.

customer_reviews.title: No resistance
customer_reviews.text: Ring is nice, but not like the aeropilates one I use at the studio. This one seems "flimsy" with hardly any resistance.

customer_reviews.title: No instructions

product_meta.title: Stamina AeroPilates Magic Circle | for Mat & Reformer Workouts
product_meta.description:
This professional quality Magic Circle can be used alone or added to your Aero Pilates reformer workout. This Magic Circle features form molded grips to fit comfortably against your body with a nonporous, molded padding that resists moisture. The Magic Circle was created by Joseph Pilates to be a versatile exercise aid you can use anywhere. The soft rubber-covered resistance ring provides faster, more targeted toning, improving muscle strength throughout the body especially in problem areas like the inner and outer thighs, upper arms, and chest.

AMAZON.COM
The Pilates Magic Circle was created by Joseph Pilates to be a versatile exercise accessory that you could use anywhere. The soft rubber ring provides resistance for faster, more targeted toning to improve muscle strength throughout the body--and especially in problem areas including the inner and outer thighs, upper arms, chest, and the pelvic muscles. This Magic Circle boasts professional grade, nonporous molded padding with form-molded grips to fit comfortably against your body, over a steel core ring. The ring can be used alone or added to a Pilates reformer workout.
feature_bullets: 14.75-Inch diameter pilates magic circle with professional grade, nonporous, molded padding
Designed to improve muscle tone of inner and outer thighs, arms, and chest
Steel core ring with foam molded padded grips
Created by Joseph Pilates to be a versatile exercise accessory you can use anywhere
90 Day warranty, brown boxed version does not include instructional video

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
